content.p: Students have the opportunity to learn investment analysis through a purpose-built financial trading room. The School regularly hosts a range of talks by business leaders from the region. Find out about our international MBA study tours, and industry visits organised for undergraduates and postgraduates. Our students benefit from workshops and webinars conducted by faculty and industry trainers, aimed at enhancing students' employability skills. Many of our students gain invaluable experience from participation in business case competitions. Top students also benefit from Book Prizes awarded by our industry partners. Hear what our students and alumni have to say about their experience at NUBS Malaysia. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
